p1:
Our vacation program is a short unpaid, 1 to 4 week job shadow and mentorship opportunity that allows young problem solvers to experience the Africa Design Office and strengthen a specific growth area.

If you’re young, creative and want to see how we solve wicked problems, come spend some time with us. You are never too young to make a difference and we have many opportunities for you to explore.

steps.title: Who are you?
steps.text: Send us a little bit about who you are (submit an application).

steps.title: What’s next?
steps.text: Just a little chat with somebody on the team.

steps.title: Decisions, decisions…
steps.text: And you can decide how much time you would like to spend with us.

p3: Here are some of the ways we work. We are a designed focused team that heavily relies on design thinking.

workTypes.title: Customer Experience
workTypes.content: An interaction between an organization and a customer over the duration of their relationship.

workTypes.title: User experience
workTypes.content: Enhancing user satisfaction with a product by improving the usability and accessibility, provided in the interaction with the product.

workTypes.title: User-Interface
workTypes.content: Design of user interfaces for computers, mobile devices, with the focus on maximizing usability and the user experience.

workTypes.title: Prototyping
workTypes.content: A basic version of the system is built, tested, and then reworked until an acceptable prototype is finally achieved.
